boosters.name: Hellpod Space Optimization
boosters.description: Helldivers come out of the Hellpod fully stocked on Ammo, Grenades and Stims.

boosters.name: Vitality Enhancement
boosters.description: Provides minor damage reduction from all sources for all Helldivers

boosters.name: UAV Recon Booster
boosters.description: Increases all Helldivers' effective radar range.

boosters.name: Stamina Enhancement
boosters.description: Increases all Helldivers' stamina capacity and recovery.

boosters.name: Muscle Enhancement
boosters.description: Allows Helldivers to traverse difficult terrain with ease.

boosters.name: Increased Reinforcement Budget
boosters.description: Increases the number of available reinforcements.

boosters.name: Flexible Reinforcement Budget
boosters.description: Reduces time until new reinforcements are granted once they've been depleted.

boosters.name: Localization Confusion
boosters.description: Increases the time between enemy encounters.

boosters.name: Expert Extraction Pilot
boosters.description: Lowers the time it takes for the extraction shuttle to reach the extraction beacon.

boosters.name: Motivational Shocks
boosters.description: Allows all Helldivers to recover faster after being slowed by an attack, such as acid. Does not mitigate "area effects," such as EMS strikes.

boosters.name: Experimental Infusion
boosters.description: In addition to restoring health, Stims temporarily increase movement speed and damage reduction.

boosters.name: Firebomb Hellpods
boosters.description: Lines all Hellpods with volatile incendiaries that detonate upon impact, igniting any units in vicinity of the drop site.

boosters.name: Dead Sprint
boosters.description: Allows Helldivers to keep sprinting even when they are out of stamina, draining their health instead.

boosters.name: Armed Resupply Pods
boosters.description: Mounts a modified AR-23 Liberator to all resupply pods, allowing them to double as automatic turrets.

boosters.name: Sample Extricator
boosters.description: Large enemies now have a chance of dropping Samples on death. Capped at 10 drops per mission.
